News.headline: Tickets ON SALE: Dagenham and Redbridge v Maidstone United
News.page_title: Tickets ON SALE: Dagenham and Redbridge v Maidstone United
News.URL_keywords: Tickets ON SALE: Dagenham and Redbridge v Maidstone United
News.short_description: Tickets for the Daggers home clash against Maidstone United are now on sale
News.description:
Maidstone United visit The Chigwell Construction Stadium on Tuesday 28th February, with a 7:45pm kick off.

Ticket prices can be found here. Under-10s are FREE if purchased in advance of matchday with an adult equivalent. 

Individual tickets can also be purchased on-line, on the phone and in the club shop. 

Purchase:
Online:www.daggerstickets.co.uk
Phone: 020 8592 1549 ext 21   
Club shop: Opening Times
